document_data.caption: Ongul's Water in Hermit's Wood.
document_data.name: Ongul's Water
document_data.mainbody: '''Ongul's Water''' was a small community in a wooded valley just northwest of [[Hermit's Wood]].<ref name=VGC-p80>
document_data.Geography: Ongul's Water was named for a small lake that was filled by a spring that rose there. The lake drained westward into [[Starwater River]] near a small forested island known as [[Hunters' Isle]].<ref name=VGC-p80/>
document_data.Trade: The only significant industry in Ongul's Water was a [[gristmill]] run by [[Durkin (Ongul's Water)|Durkin]], a descendant of the namesake founder [[Ongul]].<ref name=VGC-p80/>
document_data.Inhabitants: The people of Ongul's Water primarily grew vegetables and raised ducks. Some of the braver ones hunted game in Hermit's Wood, or hired themselves out as guides to visitors despite the fact that the "guides" actually knew very little about the forest itself.<ref name=VGC-p80/>
